forum.content:
(youtube內有歌詞)

香奈兒Che'Nelle-Story(中文版)

作詞：Naomi Yoshimura．Che'Nelle
作曲：Naomi Yoshimura．EIGO

You're everything in my love story
I never wanna be without you
What you've done to me babe
I'll always be in love with u,forever
Ah~

I know that I made mistakes
All the days that I got you down
You stayed right here with me
And I don't deserve you
Throughout this time
I swear I never wanted to hurt you boy
I've realized I can't do without you

Hold me don't ever leave me lonely
從相逢的那天起　一切像奇蹟般　slowly
One day at a time
無論何時　你圍繞在我身旁
Baby just u and me

就讓它開始吧 our story
第一次你緊緊的抱住我
What you've done to me babe
因為有你伴在身旁　我學會堅強
曾經的我好脆弱
是你改變了我
Your love has made me stronger now
這份愛帶來勇氣和力量

至今為止 how many times
從前的我哭個不停
You're always there for me
數不清多少次多虧了你
Every time you showed me a better way
把懷疑變為去相信的勇氣

Hold me don't ever leave me lonely
只要我們在一起　一切像奇蹟般　slowly
One day at a time
無論何時　愛伴隨在我身邊
This love is all I need

就讓它開始吧 our story
第一次你緊緊的抱住我
What you've done to me babe
因為有你伴在身旁　我學會堅強
曾經的我好脆弱
是你改變了我
Your love has made me stronger now
這份愛帶來勇氣和力量

When times are rough and complicated
哪怕失去方向
I will find a way
We will find our way
未來綻放著光芒
*取自魔鏡歌詞網*

urls.description: Che'Nelle 香奈兒-Story 中文版 (Chinese Version) 自製歌詞版 喜歡請給個LIKE ^____^
